alert.note: Alert for Marion; Warren (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 2:26PM CDT until June 24 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Marion County in south central Iowa... Northern Warren County in south central Iowa... * Until 300 PM CDT. * At 226 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Indianola, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Milo around 230 PM CDT. Ackworth around 235 PM CDT. Sandyville around 240 PM CDT. Hartford around 245 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Pleasantville and Swan. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for south central and central Iowa.
